attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Extend the No 10 Website to where all eligible voters can register "YES" OR "NO" FOR APPROVAL OF THE FOLLOWING.

1) All existing and Proposed Laws.
2) Performence and Popularity of all    MPs-Local Councilors and Euro MPs.

Set a level (suggest at least 75% have to say YES) which, if not met, will lead to the immediate dropping of the Law/Proposal under 1 and the sacking of the MP or councillor under 2.

This will lead to Goverment accountability to the Public resulting in a more sane and responsible goverment at all levels.

Under the present system the electorate have one "say" (vote) in seven years which is based on the promises of a candidate and no say at all in what the candidate does in office.
